column2: gg4 = ggplot(ss,aes(x=reorder(bmi_cat, Mean, sum),y=Mean)) + geom_bar(stat = "identity", position = 'dodge',fill= "#1C2833") +  labs(x="BMI Categories",y="") + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))
grid.arrange(gg3,gg4,ncol=2,top = "Average Medical Charges by BMI and Age Categories", left = 'Medical Charges')
